view.gui

Class MazeWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • view.gui.BasicWindow
        • view.gui.MazeWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, View

    public class MazeWindow
extends BasicWindow
implements View
    Author:
    Alon,Tomer This class is an extension of the basic windows and is the main window of the program it is also an implementation of the view as part of the MVP system
